text: Can you please elaborate after add class in section where add css file to write css for "my-custom-section" class and js for target this class.
if you are using a theme based on the CMS Boilerplate (or any theme based on it) you should add your custom styles to the already existing theme-override.css file
you can add javascript to any modules in the section by editing those modules

I still cannot check out the code on page with a screenshot. I need to investigate the console / dev tools

I have gone to sleep many nights wishing I would wake up with the ability to debug code issues by looking at a screenshot or reading someones slack question — but for some reason, as much praying and wishing I do, it hasn’t happened. There is always tomorrow!
